title: Hilary Duff's Ex-Husband Is Under Investigation For Rape
text:
2/15/2017 7:51 AM ET | Filed under: Icky Icky Poo • Hilary Duff • Legal Matters • NHL • Controversy 
This is so troubling. 
On Wednesday, it was reported that Hilary Duff 's ex-husband , named Mike Comrie , is being investigated by the El Lay police for allegedly raping a woman in his home. However, according to reports, the former NHL star claims the sexual encounter was consensual. Oof. 
Related: Hilary Comes Clean About Her Love Life In Cosmo ! 
Reportedly, the complainant met up with the 36-year-old at a bar on Saturday evening and eventually went back to the father-of-one's condo in West El Lay. The victim claims she was raped by Mike MULTIPLE times while at his residence. How awful! 
After the alleged incident, the woman immediately went to the Cedars-Sinai Medical Center and had a rape kit done. Intense stuff. 
Nonetheless, sources dished to TMZ that Comrie has known the woman for years, and admits having sex with her, but is VEHEMENT the intercourse was consensual. These same sources note the sexual encounter was a three way and that the other woman involved has yet to file a complaint. Huh. 
Mike has yet to speak to the cops about the alleged crime, but we have a feeling he will be chatting with them soon enough. We wonder what Miz Duff thinks about all of this??? 
Be sure to stay tuned for more details on this upsetting story.
